original_title: Warner Brothers Academy Awards Animation Collection
overview: The Best of Warner Bros. Animation 15 Academy® Award Winning theatrical animated shorts. Category: Best Animated Short Subjects. Franchises include Warner Bros., Hanna-Barbera and MGM. Features 15 award winning shorts, some of the most celebrated cartoons of their time.  Includes:  1. The Milky Way(1940)  2. Yankee Doodle Mouse (1943)  3. Mouse Trouble (1944)  4. Quiet Please (1945)  5. The Cat Concerto (1947)  6. Tweetie Pie (1947)  7. The Little Orphan (1949)  8. For Scent-Imental Reasons (1949)  9. So Much For So Little (1949)  10. Two Mouseketeers (1952)  11. Johann Mouse (1953)  12. Speedy Gonzales (1955)  13. Birds Anonymous (1957)  14. Knighty-Knight Bugs (1958)  15. The Dot And The Line (1965)
tagline: Warner Bros. Home Entertainment Presents: Academy Awards® Animation Collection, 15 Winners
title: Warner Brothers Academy Awards Animation Collection
